analytic.title: A Second order Cone Programming Formulation for Classifying Missing Data

abstract.p: We propose a convex optimization based strategy to deal with uncertainty in the observations of a classification problem. We assume that instead of a sample (x i , y i) a distribution over (x i , y i) is specified. In particular , we derive a robust formulation when the distribution is given by a normal distribution. It leads to Second Order Cone Programming formulation. Our method is applied to the problem of missing data, where it outperforms direct imputation.
